Package core

Class Utils.PeriodicEasing

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Utils.PeriodicEasing
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Utils.EasingFuncPrimitive<java.lang.Float>, Utils.TriFunction<java.lang.Float,​java.lang.Float,​java.lang.Float,​java.lang.Float>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Utils.LerpCCW, Utils.LerpCW, Utils.LerpFar, Utils.LerpNear
    Enclosing class:
    Utils
    public abstract static class Utils.PeriodicEasing
extends java.lang.Object
implements Utils.EasingFuncPrimitive<java.lang.Float>
    An abstract class to cover the easing periodic of values, such as angles and hues in HSV color space. Allows the range to be set to, for example, TAU radians, 360.0 degrees or 1.0 color channel.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public java.lang.Float apply​(java.lang.Float origin,
                             java.lang.Float dest,
                             java.lang.Float step)
        Applies the easing function. The abstract class's implementation check to see if the step is out of bounds, [0.0, 1.0] and if mod(origin, range) is equal to mod(dest, range). The origin is returned when the step is less than 0.0; the destination, when the step is greater than 1.0.
        Specified by:
        apply in interface Utils.EasingFuncPrimitive<java.lang.Float>
        Specified by:
        apply in interface Utils.TriFunction<java.lang.Float,​java.lang.Float,​java.lang.Float,​java.lang.Float>
        Parameters:
        origin - the origin
        dest - the destination
        step - the step
        Returns:
        the eased object
        See Also:
        eval(float, float), applyUnclamped(Float, Float, Float)

      • applyUnclamped

        public abstract java.lang.Float applyUnclamped​(java.lang.Float origin,
                                               java.lang.Float dest,
                                               java.lang.Float step)
        Applies the easing function without checked whether the step is out of bounds, [0.0, 1.0].
        Parameters:
        origin - the origin value
        dest - the destination value
        step - the step
        Returns:
        the interpolated value

        public void setRange​(float range)
